page.title: 18The School Day in 1985.
page.content: My Mmum woke me at about eight to get up and have some breakfast before going to school, when I got down my sister Gemma was still eating her cereal. After breakfast I got together my England Kit for the sports day which was going to be today, before long two freinds arrived to walk with me to school. At school we always arrive about half an hour early so we could have a game of football before school starts. When the doors open at 8.50a.m. we go in ans start work on the Blackboard Maths which are some revision sums our teacher Mr Hodges puts on the board, while we are doing these on silence he calls out the register and the lunch register, that is those that will be staying for lunch on that particular day.
